Text:
Can we update to 11.530 ?
Are the serials works with ?
Can someone tell me how i can install this i only get Net Render and no Cinema 4d?

@xnick101 I had the same issue, then I realized what I did wrong. Very early in the installation process, you'll encounter a screen that asks you to enter your name, company, ect. In the lower left there will be a space for you to enter your serial numbers. Copy and paste ALL the text from the attached serials.txt file into this space before continuing.
great download and clean! only proble ive found is no serial for bodypaint or net render but apart from them its all good!
Can you update it to a later version after installing it and placing the SN ?

Does this run in Mac OSX Tiger 10.4.11?
Does it have Body Paint, etc?
Yep, runs in Tiger :) still looking for Body paint
